modName: Dovahkiin's Bizarre Adventure-To Be Continued Death Sound
summary: A death sound replacer with your favorite meme!
descriptionHtml:
What:Â 
This small mod replaces that hum-drum death sound with something a little more bizarre. The song is the same one used in the famous "To Be Continued" meme; true art indeed. The actual song is called "Roundabout" By 70's Progressive rock band Yes. Other JoJo mods are recommended for the best experience.

Why: Your next line is: "Why would you make this?"
My answer: A wise artist once asked: "Does art imitate life? Or does life imitate art?" I don't know the answer to that question, but to answer yours, I made this because I thought it would be fun, sheesh...

I don't think this mod has any copyright issues, there's one very similar mod for F04 which I recommend, it inspired me to do this. Thanks to whomever downloads this.
author: Mazioman
